content: वैखानस {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (सी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) Relating to a hermit, ascetic, monastic; वैखानसं किमनया व्रतमा प्रदानाद् व्यापाररोधि मदनस्य निषेवितव्यं <ls>Ś. 1. 27.</ls> --सः An anchorite, a hermit (वानप्रस्थ); a Brāhmaṇa in the third order of his religious life; <ls>R. 14. 28</ls>; <ls>Bk. 3. 46.</ls>
